biotools.summary: eQTLHap is a comprehensive eQTL analysis tool that scans the genome for different kinds of associations. It is a  haplotype-based eQTL approach identifies genetic associations not detected through conventional SNP-based methods.

bioschemas.name: eQTLHap
bioschemas.summary: eQTLHap is a comprehensive eQTL analysis tool that scans the genome for different kinds of associations. It is a  haplotype-based eQTL approach identifies genetic associations not detected through conventional SNP-based methods.
